Name: Naturalist Stories
About the game: We move on the planet with great speed and do not notice it. From birth, we strive for the new - the mysterious and the unknown. The travelerâ€™s own soul calls you on the road again and again. And again you incase your backpack and now you are moving along the road of fate through unknown fields, meadows and forests to meet adventures. Nature hides many mysteries, you have to get acquainted with amazing animals and insects, study their behavior and habitat Naturalist Stories - This game is first-person, here you have to carry out scientific tasks and experiments from the Research Center and the University of Zoology as a young researcher. According to the plot of the game, you own a nursery with an abandoned house and other buildings. Your photographs will be posted in a special gallery and animals will also appear in the adjacent nursery after the mission is completed. Badges and awards For completing the mission you will receive rewards - medals and badges. They will appear on a special stand at home and you can always see them. Gallery Here are posted your photos that will be made during the missions. Nursery After completing the tasks, animals or other representatives of the animal world will be added to the nursery. Nature Beautiful and picturesque landscapes will be a nice bonus when completing missions. Photogrammetry The game presents real pictures of trees, grass and other objects of flora and fauna. Music and sound Soundtrack missions specially selected to full immersion into the world of wildlife and relaxation. Therapy There are no murders, scenes of violence and cruelty in the game, but there are nature and animals.
